channel.title: 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command
channel.description:
'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
I get this everytime I click on build in my client. I'm using the richscape client. How can I fix it? :o Thanks in advance.
~ Macoronizer

item.title: 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Set your environmental variables.

You can learn how to do that here.

Read full topic
item.source: 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command

item.title: 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command
item.dc:creator: @i_nelson_i i nelson i
item.description:
@i_nelson_i wrote:

download jre from same place as jdk,

jdk = too compile

jre = to run a server/client
